----------------- 1.Description -----------------
Once a Raider and one of Vvulf's favorite mistress, The Shrapnel met her end during an excursion against the hamlet's militia. At the time fascinated by the Brigand's Pounder technological marvel, your Ancestor recovered her, half dead, and used her body as an attempt to fuse man and machine. She eventually escaped with her life, but years later she's back for his head.
The Shrapnel is a backline AoE specialist heavily relying on marks. Her weapon requires frequent reloads you have to pay for, so be careful with your supplies and don't burn ammo for nothing.
